title: Compliance.Validate.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Compliance.Validate capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the subject/org profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

facts.description: Facts or evidence to validate (from Risk-Assessor, Vendor-Manager, Worker agents, etc.).

standards.description: List of standards, mandates, or clauses to validate against.
